scenario.text: You encounter a street vendor selling boosters. What do you do?
scenario.rightEffect: player.morality += 2; return "You avoided trouble and preserved your morality.";

scenario.text: You see a citizen trapped under debris. Do you help?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 15; return "You left them behind, saving yourself but losing respect.";

scenario.text: A suspicious package lies in front of you. Do you open it?
A neighbor asks for help during a blackout. What do you do?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 2; return "You ignored the neighbor, slightly increasing your infamy.";

scenario.text: A vendor offers free VR sessions. Do you accept?
A hacker offers you secret information in VR. Do you log in?
scenario.rightEffect: player.morality += 5; return "You ignored the offer, preserving your moral standing.";

scenario.text: You receive a flyer for a rebel meeting. Do you attend?
An officer orders you to spy on a neighbor. What do you do?
scenario.leftEffect: player.infamy += 10; return "You reported your neighbor, increasing your infamy.";

scenario.text: You encounter street punks harassing civilians. What do you do?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 4; return "You walked away, but your reputation suffered.";

scenario.text: A N.E.O. patrol is chasing rebels nearby. What do you do?
scenario.rightEffect: player.infamy += 4; return "You hid, and your infamy increased slightly.";
